body: ntr foundation but vanilla series, what a boring combination. if they want to make vanilla manhwa why the fuck they take ntr novel in the first place.
I sincerely hope this ends up having a different ending than the webnovel; and that if it does, it gets an english translation someday.

do you know what sucks? is that the scanlation group of english left of at chapter 60+ something despite having bad negative rates the artstyle really makes it up for it , idc if its lead to good/bad ending i just wanna read and finish it , hopefully someday someone will pick up this series and translate it all , That goes to other series Like Don't be like this Son in Law at Toptoon now its called Stop it Mr kim. thats all thank you for reading
